scripts.compile: rm -rf dist && sed -i '' "s/hdc'/$npm_config_camera'/g" src/config/index.ts && tsc  --project tsconfig.build.json && rm -rf compiled/odc-api-$npm_config_camera.js && ncc build dist/index.js -o compiled && mv compiled/index.js compiled/odc-api-$npm_config_camera.js && sed -i '' "s/$npm_config_camera'/hdc'/g" src/config/index.ts
scripts.compile-dev: rm -rf dist && sed -i '' "s/hdc'/$npm_config_camera'/g" src/config/index.ts && tsc  --project tsconfig.build.json && rm -rf compiled/dashcam-api.js && ncc build dist/index.js -o compiled && mv compiled/index.js compiled/dashcam-api.js && sed -i '' "s/$npm_config_camera'/hdc'/g" src/config/index.ts
scripts.compile-win: rm -rf dist && tsc  --project tsconfig.build.json && rm -rf compiled/dashcam-api.js && ncc build dist/index.js -o compiled && mv compiled/index.js compiled/dashcam-api.js
scripts.compile-gh: rm -rf dist && sed -i "s/hdc'/$npm_config_camera'/g" src/config/index.ts && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && rm -rf compiled/odc-api-$npm_config_camera.js && ncc build dist/index.js -o compiled && mv compiled/index.js compiled/odc-api-$npm_config_camera.js && sed -i "s/$npm_config_camera'/hdc'/g" src/config/index.ts
